title: Personal Care Home One space available Will not last!
posting_body: Personal Care Home located in Riverdale 5 bed 5 bath Rent/Food/Laundry/Toiletries/Furniture/ Cable/Internet/All Inclusive
*Ensure resident receive their medication on time
*Support residents who may need assistance moving around
*Cook meals according to the resident's restrictions
*Do necessary housekeeping to maintain a clean environment
*Inform physicians or supervisors about uncommon events
*Act quickly and responsibly in cases of emergency
